Locale.Value:
[New] Standalone editor: Open the card editor and pop it up to become a stand-alone editor, which can be edited in conjunction with the main window. It brings amazing visualize writing exerience together with Graph
[New] Unsorted management: used to manage articles and files that are not included in any project
[New] Parse the Tag in the text imported or pasted as the Lattics Tag
[New] Up/Down hotkey to move the article focus in the project outline, and Shift + Up/Down hotkey to select articles
[Optimize] Solved some details that affect the experience

【新增】独立编辑器：打开卡片编辑器，可将其弹出，变为独立编辑器，可与主窗口协同编辑。与图谱界面搭配使用，将会带来非凡的「可视化写作」体验
【新增】未分类管理：用于管理不被任何项目收录的文章和文件
【新增】将导入和粘贴到 Lattics 中的文本里的 Tag  解析为 Lattics 的 Tag
【新增】支持使用 Up/Down 移动项目大纲的文章焦点，支持 Shift + Up/Down 多选项目大纲中的文章
【优化】解决了一些影响体验的细节问题
